name.ja: <ruby>蛇眼の断罪龍<rt>スネークアイズ・エクゼキュート・ドラゴン</rt></ruby>

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster on the field or in either GY; place it face-up in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell, also this card cannot use this effect next turn. During the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 2 cards on the field (1 monster and 1 Continuous Spell); destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Snake-Eyes Execute Dragon" once per turn.
